# diatomics
A python tool for working with [The Diatomic Molecular Spectroscopy
Database](https://rios.mp.fhi.mpg.de/index.php).

## Install
```bash
python -m pip install -e .
```

## Use
```bash
python -m diatomics Sr
```

```bash
python -m diatomics Sr F
```

```bash
python -m diatomics --help
```
